contents:
Happy Halloween!! The days leading up to Halloween always coincide with midterm exams. Therefore, this time I want to combine the content from our English textbook with Halloween-themed challenges, allowing students to review while having fun solving puzzles. If you’re interested, keep reading! 萬聖節來臨的日子總是很接近期中考， 因此這次我想要結合英語課本裡的內容加上萬聖節的闖關元素， 讓學生邊玩解謎、邊複習，如果您也有興趣，就繼續看下去吧! 教學對象 Class: 國小六年級 6th Grade
教學時間 Duration: 80 min-連續兩節英文課 Two consecutive English classes
版本內容: 何嘉仁E-star (2024更新：新課綱已不再使用E-star,但還是可作為活動參考喔！)
單元主題 Unit Theme: 國家Country + 交通工具Transportation
參考句型 & 單字 Key Phrases & Vocabulary:
Where is he/she from? Taiwan/ Japan/ the USA / the UK, etc. How can he/she get to the park?by bike/ by train/ by car/ on foot, etc. Halloween-related words: pumpkin/ bat/ candy, etc. 使用到的媒材 Materials Used:
Canva Holiyo密逃遊戲翻轉平台 Holiyo Escape Room Platform iPad 解謎道具 puzzle props 教師課前準備內容 Teacher’s Preparations Before Class:
解謎道具製作creation of puzzle props 謎題設計(利用Canva與Holiyo密逃遊戲翻轉平台)puzzle design (using Canva and Holiyo) PPT製作PPT preparation 向學校事先借了很多萬聖節裝扮道具borrowing various Halloween costumes from the school Halloween線上密室逃脫流程(共80min)Online Halloween Escape Room Process 引起動機 Warm Up (15-20min) 情境營造: 播放PPT、簡單向學生說明活動流程，之後照排數讓學生至台前領取萬聖節裝扮道具Set the scene: Play the PPT and briefly explain the activity process to students. Then, let students come to the front to choose their Halloween costumes. 小組派代表至台前找老師領取1份任務包和平板(每人1台)Group leaders go to the front to receive a mission pack and an iPad (one per person). 學生用平板掃描QR code進入Haunted House密室逃脫Students use the iPads to scan the QR code to enter the Haunted House escape room. 教師提醒學生活動進行間的注意事項Teacher reminds students of important points during the activity. 發展活動 Practice (40min ) 學生開始解謎，一共有6道謎題Students start solving puzzles, with a total of 6 puzzles. 教師巡堂，觀察各組情形，適時給予提示與幫助Teacher circulates the room, observing each group’s progress and providing hints and assistance as needed. 綜合活動 Wrap up (20min) 闖關成功小組全員舉手告訴教師，並讓平板秀出逃脫成功頁面Successful groups raise their hands to inform the teacher and show the escape success page on their iPads. 全班完成後，教師邀請學生分享解題過程Once the whole class finishes, the teacher invites students to share their problem-solving processes. It’s Treat Time! 教師分享jelly beans，恭喜全班成功完成解謎任務It’s Treat Time! The teacher shares jelly beans to congratulate the whole class on successfully completing the puzzle challenge. 小結 Summary 每一道題目中都藏著學生學習過的內容，再加上需要思考動腦與觀察，大家都玩得很開心，破解出謎題也讓學生獲得成就感！Each puzzle contains content that the students have previously learned, combined with the need for brain storming and observation. Everyone had a great time, and solving the puzzles gave the students a sense of achievement! 在活動中鼓勵大家團隊合作，認真投入的組別我會馬上在全班面前讚美他們，給予大家學習的機會;也會遇到有組別頻頻卡關，這時老師就要過去給予協助並鼓勵．小組與小組間也能互相幫忙，提醒學生用給提示的方式，不直接說答案．Throughout the activity, I encouraged teamwork. Praised groups that were engaged and working hard in front of the whole class, providing everyone with a learning opportunity. There were also some groups that encountered frequent challenges; at those times, I would go over to offer assistance and encouragement. Groups could also help each other, just reminding students to give hints rather than directly revealing the answers. 有遇到少部分學生直接向別組問答案的狀況，我當時是和學生說：老師會再問你們的解題過程，直接知道答案，就少了解謎的樂趣了，如果真的想不到，再來找老師給提示．There were a few students who asked other groups for answers. In those instances, I told them: “I will ask you about your problem-solving process. If you just know the answer right away, you miss out on the fun of solving the puzzle. If you really can’t think of anything, then come to me for a hint.”
title: Halloween線上密室逃脫X小六英語

Candice 設計的 Halloween Escape 情境佈置 領取任務包top secret folder： 每組至台前找老師領取1份任務包 (各關提示卡)和平板(每組2台,每組約3-4人)
下圖為top secret folder任務包內容物
學生用平板掃描QR code進入Haunted House密室逃脫介面： 教師提醒學生活動進行間的注意事項： 發展活動 Practice (40min ) Halloween Escape- Holiyo密室逃脫介面 (可點擊圖片右方箭頭 “>” 進行預覽) 或點擊 連結：Halloween Escape- Holiyo密室逃脫
學生開始解謎，一共有6道謎題 Q1: 根據top secret folder內的提示卡，找出答案國家 Based on the cue card, find the answer country. Candice 設計的 Round 1
Q2: 根據top secret folder內的提示卡，找出安娜貝爾年齡 Based on the cue card, find Annabelle’s age. Candice 設計的 Round 2
Q3: 根據top secret folder內的提示卡，找出答案國家 Based on the cue card, find the answer country. Candice 設計的 Round 3 Q4: 根據top secret folder內的提示卡，找出課本內學過的單字總數量 Based on the cue card, find how many words. Candice 設計的 Round 4
Q5: 根據top secret folder內的提示卡，找出相對應的密碼 Based on the cue card, find the code. Candice 設計的 Round 5
Q6: 根據top secret folder內的提示卡，找出相對應的密碼 Based on the cue card, find the code. Candice 設計的 Round6
教師巡堂，觀察各組情形，適時給予提示與幫助 綜合活動 Wrap up (20min) 闖關成功小組全員舉手告訴教師，並讓平板秀出逃脫成功頁面 全班完成後，教師邀請學生一同對答案與分享解題過程 It’s Treat Time! 教師分享jelly beans，恭喜全班成功完成解謎任務 小結 Summary 每一道題目中都藏著學生學習過的內容，再加上需要思考動腦與觀察，大家都玩得很開心，破解出謎題也讓學生獲得成就感！ 在活動中鼓勵大家團隊合作，認真投入的組別我會馬上在全班面前讚美他們，給予大家學習的機會;也會遇到有組別頻頻卡關，這時老師就要過去給予協助並鼓勵．小組與小組間也能互相幫忙，提醒學生用給提示的方式，不直接說答案． 有遇到少部分學生直接向別組問答案的狀況，我當時是和學生說：老師會再問你們的解題過程，直接知道答案，就少了解謎的樂趣了，如果真的想不到，再來找老師給提示． Halloween Escape PPT 謎題+解答 Candice 設計的 Halloween Escape 公開連結：Halloween Escape簡報
